review: Never been much of a tech guy but when my brother gave me the firestick i never heard of it. Was amazed how easy it was to setup just plugged it in and it was ready to go out of the box all you need is a wifi connection and about 10mins for it to update.  If you dont i would highly recommended getting netflix, hulu, and amazon prime.  All of which make this device worth way more then the 40 price tag. Its a must have you really out done yourself amazon!!!
